entry.title: High Wind Warning issued January 27 at 1:03AM MST until January 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines.
entry.cap:areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
